name: Hash Line
detailed_description:
Play as an Artificial intelligence. Go through training and become an elite member of your systems cyber security program. Strike down your foe with your cyber blade. Use your precision and agility to eliminate your adversaries. Save your system from destruction.

Uncover the truth. Save your system from the infection. Show your creator the light. Protect your world while being pitted against the spread of malicious foes. Cut down your enemy. Deconstruct the virus. Fight for your existence.

STRIKE WITH PRECISION
Take control with precise strikes to eliminate your enemy. Control the angle of your slice to cut around your foes defences. Strike with haste, strike with strength, strike with precision.

CHANGE THE PLAYING FIELD
Cut apart your environment to take the advantage on your foes. Remove any obstacles in your way. Destroy the virus.

FAST FLUID MOVEMENT
Traverse levels with ease. The fluidity of movement will keep the battle at its best.

TAKE CONTROL OF TIME IT SELF
Control time. Control combat. Slow time to gain an edge of complex sword strikes. Splitting bullets, slicing fragments, controlling the fight.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-460 @ 3,60GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 670, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 621 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Sierra 10.12.4
  • Processor: 3.7GHz Quad-Core Intel Xeon E5 processor
  • Memory: 621 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dual 2GB AMD FirePro D300 graphics cards
